forbrukningstyp.title: Consumption type:
forbrukningstyp.description: Type of consumption. Possible values are 'EL' for electricity and 'FJV' for district heating

nyckelkod.title: Key code
nyckelkod.description: The key code area consumption refers to. Umeå municipality is divided into geographical areas, which are also called key code areas or sub-areas. The division is primarily made in order to be able to plan different municipal activities based on how many people live in the different parts of the municipality.

enhet.title: Unit
enhet.description: The unit of consumption value. Examples of units are kWh and m3

period.title: Period
period.description: Which calendar year and calendar month to which consumption is linked in the format YYYYMM.

tidpunkt.title: Time
tidpunkt.description: Timestamp that identifies the period of consumption.

detaljniva.title: Level of detail
detaljniva.description: The time granularity in which the consumption data is aggregated. Examples of granularity are 'Timme (Hour)', 'Dag (Day)' or 'Månad (Month)'
